pkgmetadata.longdescription: Analysis of NCES Education Survey and Assessment Data // Read in and analysis functions for education survey and assessment data from the National Center for Education Statistics (NCES) https://nces.ed.gov/ including National Assessment of Educational Progress (NAEP) data https://nces.ed.gov/nationsreportcard/ and data from the International Assessment Database: OECD http://www.oecd.org/, including PISA, TALIS, PIAAC; and IEA http://www.iea.nl/, including TIMSS, TIMSS Advanced, PIRLS, ICCS, ICILS, and CivEd.
